Name: BAD END THEATER
About the game: welcome to BAD END THEATER! select your protagonist and explore a variety of terrible fates! the decisions you make in one story will affect the others. you can toggle these behaviors to open up new paths! unfortunately, every path leads to a bad ending... can you find a way to save this unlucky cast? playtime: 1-3 hours to see all endings (it's a puzzle game, so this varies widely) FEATURES 16k words, 600 illustrations, 40+ endings CREDITS story + art + music - NomnomNami animation - chunderfins TRANSLATION Español (LATAM) - José Jil Tudela Español (ES), Euskara - Gabriel Fiallegas Medina (Basajaun Games) Français - Yuri Akuto Deutsch - Marshmelie Nederlands - Demi Italiano - Rypher Português - Fah Braccini Svenska - Felix Hindemo Polski - Dominika Klag Русский - Zweelee 한국어 - KyleHeren 简体中文 - Yuriatelier 日本語 - Lin YuFan Tiếng Việt - Bánh Türkçe - Ebru Nilay Vural עברית - swagster2000 العربية - Montassar Ghanmi
